Key Match Events: Jaker Ali collided with Anamul Haque while attempting to catch Pramod Madushan, resulting in his injury and being carried off the field on a stretcher.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Soumya Sarkar, who had a neck injury after striking an advertising board, had to leave the game.
Mustafizur Rahman also left the game due to cramping and had to leave on a stretcher.
Tanzid Hasan was selected to replace Soumya Sarkar in cases of concussions.
Umpire Tanvir Ahmed took over for Richard Kettleborough for the third ODI due to heat-related issues.
